person.persName: John Buckner Lendrum (Covington, Ky, justice of the peace, mayor pro tem, and bookkeeper)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, bookkeeper. Virginia native. Son of Thomas Keith Lendrum and Margaret Stokes Landrum. Married to Elizabeth Lendrum. Father of Thomas Lendrum, Harry Lendrum, and Lilley Lendrum. Bookkeeper in Covington in 1860. Appointed mayor pro tem of Covington in 1862. Justice of the peace in Kenton County in 1863.
